division.explanation: Write the name of the court location (like 'Honolulu' or 'Kauai').

civil_number.explanation: Write your case number. You can find this on other court papers for your case.

plaintiffs.explanation: Write the full name of the person who started the case (the one suing).

defendants.explanation: Write your full name (you are the person asking for more time in the case).

filing_party_info.explanation: Write your name and contact details (address, phone, etc.). If you have a lawyer, write their info instead.

type_of_motion.explanation: Write what kind of hearing you want to delay (for example: 'Trial', 'Pre-Trial', 'Returnable', etc.).

other_type.explanation: If it's a different type of hearing not listed, write it here (like 'Mediation' or 'Status Conference').

reason_for_continuance.explanation: Explain why you need more time or why you can’t attend the original court date.

old_date_time.explanation: Write the current date and time the court was supposed to hear the case.

new_date_time.explanation: Write the new date and time you are asking the court to reschedule to.

number_of_prior_continuances.explanation: Write how many times you have already asked the court to change the date before this request.

opposing_party_name.explanation: Write the name of the other person or their lawyer (the one on the other side of your case).

certificate_service_date.explanation: Write the date you gave or mailed a copy of this Motion to the other party.

service_method.explanation: Say how you sent the Motion: write 'Hand-delivery' if in person, or 'Mail' if sent by post.

service_address.explanation: Write the address where you gave or mailed the copy to the other party.

filing_party_signature.explanation: Sign your name to say the information in this Motion is true.

filing_party_name.explanation: Print or type your name under your signature.

response_choice.explanation: The other party will check one: either they agree (don’t object) or disagree with your request.

response_reason_if_disagree.explanation: If the other person disagrees, they can explain why here.

response_service_date.explanation: Date the other party sent you their response to the Motion.

response_service_method.explanation: How the response was sent to you: 'Hand-delivery' or 'Mail'.

response_service_address.explanation: Where the response was delivered or mailed to you.

opposing_party_signature.explanation: The other party signs here if they are sending a response.
